mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Square Dance Travel", "Tour Guide for 1982", "A Philippine Accent", "Further Notes on Caller Education", "Quarterly Movement Report", "Gavel & Key" and "National Convention." This edition also includes the regular features entitled "From the Floor" (letters to the editor), "As I See It", "Discovery", "Contra Corner", "Take A Good Look", "The Dancer's Walkthru", "Traditional Treasury", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "The Callers Notebook", "Experimental Notes", "Ladies on the Square", "Advanced Dancing", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "Ammunition", "Caller of the Month", "On the Record", "Current Releases", "Square Dance Date Book" and "Style Lab."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
